attributes.action: have the family occupying the royal palaces and fulfilling the role of being the british royal family be elected to serve a three year term by a public vote
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
(1) The institutions of the UK royal family and monarchy should be retained exactly as they are 
(2) The family that occupies the job of being royal family (opening fetes and such-like) should be elected by public vote to serve a three year term 
(3) The family chosen to act as the UK's royal family should be selected on a whole family basis by means of public vote.

We can keep every facet of our ancient institution and turn it into something that is democratic. The family occupying the palaces should be voted in to serve a three year term. We are advocating a "Big Monarchy"; that is to say a monarchy that is drawn from the contribution of all the people of our country.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
